column1: @33@^GAS Borla^@^GAS Borla^@33@^http://www.borla.com/products/shelby_mustang_gt500_catback_exhaust_touring_part__140321.html^@^Shelby Mustang GT500 2010 Cat-Back™ Exhaust Touring part # 140321^@140321@^Cat-Back™ Exhaust^@^Since mid-1964 Mustang has always been about muscle looks and loads of customization options. BORLA®’s lineup for the 2010 Mustang GT and Shelby GT500 lives up to this legacy with systems to meet a wide variety of performance goals and budgets. Fo soundaholic Mustang GT drivers who won’t settle for anything less than unbridled performance with a pure aggressive pony car growl BORLA® offers a Cat-Back™ (PN140318) and rear section (PN11777) system each featuring BORLA®’s cylindrical S-Type mufflers. Both are also available with BORLA®’s more sound-absorbing Touring mufflers (PN140319) and (PN11778) for sleeper fans who prefer to be more subtle about their power upgrades. Responding to the high-output exhaust needs of the supercharged 2010 Shelby GT500 BORLA® engineers developed a specially-tuned Multicore Cat-Back™ system (PN140320) which includes an X-Pipe. BORLA®’s patented high-velocity Multicore design distributes exhaust gases through multiple straight-through perforated cores. A race-tested innovation Multicore technology is also utilized in BORLA®’s elite XR-1® mufflers used by winning teams in NHRA Baja 1000 and many other racing venues and has been proven to actually outflow a straight pipe. GT500 owners who want the performance boost of a BORLA® exhaust but prefer a sound just slightly louder than stock will find a perfect fit in PN140321 a Touring Cat-Back™ system. All of BORLA®’s 2010 Mustang GT and Shelby GT500 systems feature high-quality austenitic stainless steel construction ultra-smooth mandrel-bent 2.5” tubing flawless welding from master craftsmen mirror-polished 4” diameter angle-cut 12” dual tips with rolled edges and an unrivaled Million Mile Warranty. From the dimensions and perforation patterns of the inner cores to the amount of composite filament packing all specifications of BORLA® mufflers are tuned on a vehicle-by-vehicle basis for an optimum blend of performance and sound. Combined with distinctive motorsport styling easy bolt-on installation and enhanced fuel economy the world’s most winning exhaust continues to lead the industry it founded over 30 years ago.  ...Read More^@^http://www.borla.com/productImages/misc/140321_xlarge.jpg^@^http://www.borla.com/productImages/misc/140321_large.jpg

column1: @109@^GAS Borla^@^GAS Borla^@109@^http://www.borla.com/products/ctsv_catback_exhaust_part__140126.html^@^CTS-V 2004-2007 Cat-Back™ Exhaust part # 140126^@140126@^Cat-Back™ Exhaust^@^BORLA® Performance Industries’ RD Staff has combined its knowledge of professional racing the Corvette Gen. III LS-1 V8 engine and high-end luxury sports cars to design another winner for the Cadillac CTS Series. The CTS-V has raised the bar for lux ry sports touring vehicles with a true balance of outstanding performance sports handling and Cadillac luxury and BORLA®’s tuned exhaust delivers the smooth sounds of performance without being offensive to the occupants. BORLA®’s 26-year heritage once again has given us an upper hand. BORLA® the exhaust system of choice for the Bondurant School of High Performance Driving uses as base race vehicles the Corvette and Cadillac CTS and relies on BORLA®. This system (Part #140126) for the CTS-V is a blend of increased flow and performance with quality sound attenuation only available from BORLA®. As you’ve come to expect the BORLA® system is fabricated from full aircraft quality high quality austenitic mandrel bent stainless steel with careful effort being exercised to make a true bolt-on system. The Corvette power plant maintains status as a true performance icon while the Cadillac has gained significant recognition in the world race arena. This amalgamation is what BORLA® is all about. Kind of what made hot rodding so popular -- blending old school with new. Big power stick shift or automatic with a sophisticated quality luxury car…look out AMG and M5! BORLA® Performance Industries the original pioneers of aerospace-grade high quality austenitic stainless steel (superior to 409 or aluminized steel) free-flow exhaust utilizing patented award and race winning technology to deliver quality sound performance gains and enhanced fuel economy — all with an easy bolt-on installation. All BORLA® street products carry the famous BORLA® written million-mile warranty.  ...Read More^@^http://www.borla.com/productImages/misc/140126_vehicle_lg.jpg^@^http://www.borla.com/productImages/misc/140126_th_vehicle_sm.jpg

column1: @227@^GAS Borla^@^GAS Borla^@227@^http://www.borla.com/products/camaro_ss_catback_exhaust_touring_part__140281.html^@^Camaro SS 2010-2013 Cat-Back™ Exhaust Touring part # 140281^@140281@^Cat-Back™ Exhaust^@^"Touring" Chevrolet pulled all the stops to ensure the re-launch of the legendary Camaro was worth the wait to agonized fans and the world’s most winning exhaust has responded in kind. Rather than simply work from concept vehicles and drawings BOR A® R&D engineers headed down under to the GM Holden facility in Australia to work directly with the GM Camaro team. The result of this exciting collaboration is a series of exhaust systems including Cat-Back™s™ rear sections and long-tube headers providing the ultimate in tuned performance sound style and fitment. BORLA®’s Camaro Cat-Back™ arsenal is led by an aggressive high-performance “S” type system (PN140280) that utilizes patented XR-1® technology from BORLA® exhausts used in race-winning Corvettes and other GM champions. Drivers who prefer a more subdued sound will opt for (PN140281) a “Touring” version that combines a racing heart with a more stealth-like growl. V6 owners get a big piece of Cat-Back™ action too with a power-adding dual system (PN140282) that amplifies the 3.6L powerplant well into V8 territory. Each of these Cat-Back™ options (including the V6 system) comes complete with an x-pipe for increased flow and richer sound and is also available as a rear section. (PN11775) (PN11774) and the V6 version (PN11776). On top of the power sound and looks drivers also enjoy significant weight savings with a BORLA® exhaust shedding as much as 43lbs over stock — enough to make a difference at the pump and the track. Like all BORLA® exhaust products the Camaro systems feature durable high-quality austenitic stainless steel construction patented “power when you want it fuel economy when you need it” technology mirror-polished tips and a Million-Mile Warranty. For serious racers BORLA® has topped their lineup with long tube stainless steel XR-1® Headers (PN17249). Combining 1¾” primary tubes with patented race merge collectors this product is a direct result of BORLA®’s 30-year legacy with race-winning Chevrolets from Indy to Daytona  ...Read More^@^http://www.borla.com/productImages/misc/140281_vehicle_lg.jpg^@^http://www.borla.com/productImages/misc/140281_th_vehicle_sm.jpg
column7: /tip_35_th.jpg^@@@^2010-2013^@^Fits these Vehicles 2010-2013 Chevrolet Camaro SS 6.2L V8 Auto/Manual RWD 2 Door Coupe/Convertible^@

column1: @231@^GAS Borla^@^GAS Borla^@231@^http://www.borla.com/products/wrx_wrx_sti_catback_exhaust_stype_part__140075.html^@^WRX/ WRX STI 2002-2007 Cat-Back™ Exhaust S-Type part # 140075^@140075@^Cat-Back™ Exhaust^@^More Aggressive "S-Type" Cat-Back™. The mellow "Touring" Cat-Back™ exhaust is part# 140053 also known as the BORLA® Hush. BORLA® Performance once again leads the industry with a high flow performance exhaust for the hot Subaru WRX and WRX STI. This Ca -Back™ system BORLA® #140075 is custom designed by BORLA® engineers for the 2.5L turbocharged 4-cylinder engine with automatic and manual transmissions. Winning on racetracks around the world has given BORLA® a leg up on the competition with trickle down technology from the world ’s fastest cars. The unique design is a direct bolt-on fit that meets all emission requirements. The system has shown significant flow and performance improvements by virtue of BORLA® XR-1® patented technology utilizing 3" tubing that exits with a super looking BORLA® logo embossed 4"angle cut rolled edge single round polished tip. More flow means more power and if you tune this turbocharged super import that flow will simply allow even more power. When you get a close look inside this muffler you can see the patented BORLA® XR-1® multi cores -- that look says total performance. Increased fuel mileage is an added benefit. And one more thing it has a great sound too but then you’ve come to expect that from BORLA®. Add a BORLA® header (#17217) for even more performance. BORLA® Performance Industries the original pioneers of high quality austenitic stainless steel (superior to T-409 or aluminized steel) free flow exhaust utilizes its patented award and race winning technology to deliver quality sound performance gains and enhanced fuel economy – all with an easy bolt-on installation. All BORLA® street products carry the famous BORLA® written million-mile warranty.  ...Read More^@^http://www.borla.com/productImages/misc/140075_vehicle_lg.jpg^@^http://www.borla.com/productImages/misc/140075_th_vehicle_sm.jpg
column5: /tip_37_th.jpg^@@@^2002-2007^@^Fits these Vehicles 2002-2007 Subaru Impreza WRX 2.0L/2.5L Turbo 4cyl AWD Auto/Manual Trans 4-Door/Wagon [and] 2004-2007 Subaru Impreza WRX STI 2.5L Turbo 4cyl AWD Auto/Manual Trans 4-Door Sedan/Hatch^@

column1: @232@^GAS Borla^@^GAS Borla^@232@^http://www.borla.com/products/wrx_wrx_sti_catback_exhaust_part__140312.html^@^WRX/ WRX STI 2008-2012 Cat-Back™ Exhaust part # 140312^@140312@^Cat-Back™ Exhaust^@^BORLA® Performance announces the release of a new quad-exit Cat-Back™ exhaust for the venerable 2008 – ‘09 Subaru WRX STi. This race-inspired system (PN140312) checks all the boxes on every Subaru enthusiasts’ hit list taking this flagship to an eve higher realm of performance. For starters BORLA® engineers upgraded the STi’s exhaust plumbing from 2.5 to 3” in diameter. The resulting increased airflow through the turbocharged powerplant provides horsepower gains of 7% - 10%. Hardcore enthusiasts who add Stage 1 or 2 chip upgrades will find this boost to the STi’s lung capacity vital to unlocking the ECU’s full potential. Drivers negotiating terrain from rally course jumps to shopping mall speedbumps will appreciate how BORLA®’s RD fabricators found room to tuck the system muffler higher than the OE exhaust providing a 1.75” clearance gain. This additional room also enhances rear-section aerodynamics and improves appearance by reducing clutter. Besides being higher it’s lighter. Thanks to BORLA®’s patented straight-through design that eliminates power-robbing baffles and chambers the STi sheds approximately 8 lbs making it a bit leaner meaner in a class where every bit counts. True to form the exhaust amplifies and enhances the STi’s distinctive rumbling gurgle with the rich bass of BORLA®’s trademark sound of power. Combined with high-quality austenitic stainless steel construction and double-walled rolled-edge polished tips drivers get the sound and looks they expect from the world’s most winning exhaust. BORLA® the original pioneers of high-quality stainless steel free-flow exhaust utilizes patented award and race winning technology to deliver quality sound and performance gains. All with an easy bolt-on installation and backed by a solid Million-Mile Warranty on all street systems.  ...Read More^@^http://www.borla.com/productImages/misc/140312_vehicle_lg.jpg^@^http://www.borla.com/productImages/misc/140312_th_vehicle_sm.jpg

column1: @457@^GAS Borla^@^GAS Borla^@457@^http://www.borla.com/products/mustang_v6_catback_exhaust_atak_part__140398.html^@^Mustang V6 2011-2014 Cat-Back™ Exhaust ATAK® part # 140398^@140398@^Cat-Back™ Exhaust^@^BORLA® has announced the development of a revolutionary new exhaust technology that enables their engineers to deliver unprecedented vehicle-specific control over the acoustical note of an exhaust throughout the RPM range while retaining 100% of the power-adding capabilities of BORLA®’s patented Multicore design. Called ATAK®™ (Acoustically-Tuned Applied Kinetics) this exclusive technology (U.S. patent #5248859) produces the highest available dB (decibel) levels in the BORLA® street-legal lineup and is designed for high-performance purists who prefer exhaust notes over their stereos. The focus of ATAK®™ is to pump the volume while retaining clarity of sound at the same time avoiding the drone and distortion typically found in louder exhausts. With ATAK®™ the sound output is tuned like a graphic equalizer to shape and focus sound waves for optimum high-volume output. The development of each ATAK®™ system begins with extensive study of each vehicle’s acoustical properties. The technology is based on custom-tuned attributes of the internal muffler cores which are calibrated on a vehicle-by-vehicle basis to deliver the most desirable sound. BORLA® is now shipping Cat-Back™ and/or Rear Section ATAK®™ exhaust systems for a wide variety of popular applications such as Mustang (including 2011 GT V6) Camaro Corvette Challenger GTR and more in development. Like all BORLA® exhaust products each system is handmade in the USA by master craftspeople and features premium 300-Series austenitic stainless steel construction mandrel bending by computer-controlled CNC machinery to ensure maximum flow and a perfect fit mirror-polished tips and a Million-Mile Warranty. For more information about BORLA® products visit www.BORLA®.com. Or call toll free 1-877-GO BORLA®  ...Read More^@^http://www.borla.com/productImages/misc/140398_vehicle_lg.jpg^@^http://www.borla.com/productImages/misc/140398_th_vehicle_sm.jpg

column1: @461@^GAS Borla^@^GAS Borla^@461@^http://www.borla.com/products/shelby_mustang_gt500_catback_exhaust_multicore_part__140320.html^@^Shelby Mustang GT500 2010 Cat-Back™ Exhaust Multi-Core part # 140320^@140320@^Cat-Back™ Exhaust^@^Since mid-1964 Mustang has always been about muscle looks and loads of customization options. BORLA®’s lineup for the 2010 Mustang GT and Shelby GT500 lives up to this legacy with systems to meet a wide variety of performance goals and budgets. Fo soundaholic Mustang GT drivers who won’t settle for anything less than unbridled performance with a pure aggressive pony car growl BORLA® offers a Cat-Back™ (PN140318) and rear section (PN11777) system each featuring BORLA®’s cylindrical S-Type mufflers. Both are also available with BORLA®’s more sound-absorbing Touring mufflers (PN140319) and (PN11778) for sleeper fans who prefer to be more subtle about their power upgrades. Responding to the high-output exhaust needs of the supercharged 2010 Shelby GT500 BORLA® engineers developed a specially-tuned Multicore Cat-Back™ system (PN140320) which includes an X-Pipe. BORLA®’s patented high-velocity Multicore design distributes exhaust gases through multiple straight-through perforated cores. A race-tested innovation Multicore technology is also utilized in BORLA®’s elite XR-1® mufflers used by winning teams in NHRA Baja 1000 and many other racing venues and has been proven to actually outflow a straight pipe. GT500 owners who want the performance boost of a BORLA® exhaust but prefer a sound just slightly louder than stock will find a perfect fit in PN140321 a Touring Cat-Back™ system. All of BORLA®’s 2010 Mustang GT and Shelby GT500 systems feature high-quality austenitic stainless steel construction ultra-smooth mandrel-bent 2.5” tubing flawless welding from master craftsmen mirror-polished 4” diameter angle-cut 12” dual tips with rolled edges and an unrivaled Million Mile Warranty. From the dimensions and perforation patterns of the inner cores to the amount of composite filament packing all specifications of BORLA® mufflers are tuned on a vehicle-by-vehicle basis for an optimum blend of performance and sound. Combined with distinctive motorsport styling easy bolt-on installation and enhanced fuel economy the world’s most winning exhaust continues to lead the industry it founded over 30 years ago.  ...Read More^@^http://www.borla.com/productImages/misc/140320_xlarge.jpg^@^http://www.borla.com/productImages/misc/140320_large.jpg

BORLA®’s lineup for the 2010 Mustang GT and Shelby GT500 lives up to this legacy with systems to meet a wide variety of performance goals and budgets. Fo soundaholic Mustang GT drivers who won’t settle for anything less than unbridled performance with a pure aggressive pony car growl BORLA® offers a Cat-Back™ (PN140318) and rear section (PN11777) system each featuring BORLA®’s cylindrical S-Type mufflers. Both are also available with BORLA®’s more sound-absorbing Touring mufflers (PN140319) and (PN11778) for sleeper fans who prefer to be more subtle about their power upgrades. Responding to the high-output exhaust needs of the supercharged 2010 Shelby GT500 BORLA® engineers developed a specially-tuned Multicore Cat-Back™ system (PN140320) which includes an X-Pipe. BORLA®’s patented high-velocity Multicore design distributes exhaust gases through multiple straight-through perforated cores. A race-tested innovation Multicore technology is also utilized in BORLA®’s elite XR-1® mufflers used by winning teams in NHRA Baja 1000 and many other racing venues and has been proven to actually outflow a straight pipe. GT500 owners who want the performance boost of a BORLA® exhaust but prefer a sound just slightly louder than stock will find a perfect fit in PN140321 a Touring Cat-Back™ system. All of BORLA®’s 2010 Mustang GT and Shelby GT500 systems feature high-quality austenitic stainless steel construction ultra-smooth mandrel-bent 2.5” tubing flawless welding from master craftsmen mirror-polished 4” diameter angle-cut 12” dual tips with rolled edges and an unrivaled Million Mile Warranty. From the dimensions and perforation patterns of the inner cores to the amount of composite filament packing all specifications of BORLA® mufflers are tuned on a vehicle-by-vehicle basis for an optimum blend of performance and sound. Combined with distinctive motorsport styling easy bolt-on installation and enhanced fuel economy the world’s most winning exhaust continues to lead the industry it founded over 30 years ago. X-Pipe (PN 60510) may be added to this system.  ...Read More^@^http://www.borla.com/productImages/misc/140319_vehicle_lg.jpg^@^http://www.borla.com/productImages/misc/140319_th_vehicle_sm.jpg

column1: @496@^GAS Borla^@^GAS Borla^@496@^http://www.borla.com/products/shelby_mustang_gt500_catback_exhaust_multicore_part__140210.html^@^Shelby Mustang GT500 2007-2009 Cat-Back™ Exhaust Multi-Core part # 140210^@140210@^Cat-Back™ Exhaust^@^‘07-'08 Shelby GT 500 Mustang Gets Full Treatment from BORLA® Aggressive BORLA® Cat-Back™ and a Long Tube Competition Header Oxnard California – BORLA® Performance Industries owner Alex BORLA® has a star-studded history with Ford legends like Carro l Shelby who chose BORLA® for his 427 Cobra continuation series just as Ford SVT chose BORLA® for the Cobra-R Mustang. BORLA® RD engineers have designed a complete package for this new GT500 Shelby Mustang super car starting with a tuned Cat-Back™ exhaust (PN140210) incorporating unique genuine BORLA® race-bred brushed satin S-style straight-through mufflers that create more flow weigh considerably less than stock and have that incredible bold BORLA® signature sound. Testing has shown power increases above 20 horsepower alone. BORLA® has taken its racing experience and designed a custom 1-¾” full length competition header (PN17238) for the Shelby that is an engineering performance benchmark: Expensive high quality austenitic stainless steel is the foundation for the quality header this car demands and BORLA® worked with top race teams to design a header that not only is lightweight makes exceptional performance but is also ingeniously designed for chassis fit. Modeled after the successful Ford GT and Mustang GT header PN17238 allows straight forward installation and the ability to work on the car (like clutch and starter) without removing the headers. Serious competitors know what a critical time saving that is at the track. BORLA® has a 30-year tradition of building performance exhaust for high end performance machines and is the original pioneer of high quality austenitic stainless steel (superior to 409 or aluminized steel) free-flow CNC mandrel bent exhaust. Patented award and race winning technology delivers quality sound performance gains and enhanced fuel economy -- all with an easy bolt-on installation and backed by an unsurpassed written million-mile warranty.  ...Read More^@^http://www.borla.com/productImages/misc/140210_vehicle_lg.jpg^@^http://www.borla.com/productImages/misc/140210_th_vehicle_sm.jpg

column1: @498@^GAS Borla^@^GAS Borla^@498@^http://www.borla.com/products/mustang_gt_boss_302_catback_exhaust_atak_part__140372.html^@^Mustang GT/ Boss 302 2011-2012 Cat-Back™ Exhaust ATAK® part # 140372^@140372@^Cat-Back™ Exhaust^@^This Cat-Back™ is a direct bolt-on fitment but will remove the side-pipes on the Boss 302. BORLA® has developed a revolutionary new exhaust technology that enables our engineers to deliver unprecedented vehicle-specific control over the acoustica note of an exhaust throughout the RPM range while retaining 100% of the power-adding capabilities of BORLA®’s patented multicore design. Called ATAK®™ (Acoustically-Tuned Applied Kinetics) this new technology produces the highest available dB (decibel) levels in the BORLA® street-legal lineup and is designed for high-performance purists who prefer exhaust notes over their stereos. The focus of ATAK®™ is to pump the volume while retaining clarity of sound avoiding distortion typically found in louder exhausts. With ATAK®™ the sound output is tuned like a graphic equalizer to shape and focus sound waves for optimum high-volume output. The development of each ATAK®™ system begins with extensive study of each vehicle’s acoustical properties. The technology is based on custom-tuned attributes of the internal muffler cores which are calibrated on a vehicle-by-vehicle basis to deliver the most desirable sound. “The distance from the exhaust manifold to the rear bumper the shape of the underbody shielding the amount of ground clearance all these factors affect the sound and they’re different on each vehicle. With ATAK®™ we take all this into account and the result will blow you away” says company Sales Marketing Manager David BORLA®. Cat-Back™ systems (PN 140329 and 140372) will blow your socks off – with no drone. Like all BORLA® exhaust products each system is handmade in the USA by master craftspeople and features premium 300-Series high-quality austenitic stainless steel construction ultra-smooth mandrel bent piping mirror-polished tips and a Million-Mile Warranty.  ...Read More^@^http://www.borla.com/productImages/misc/140372_vehicle_lg.jpg^@^http://www.borla.com/productImages/misc/140372_th_vehicle_sm.jpg

column1: @508@^GAS Borla^@^GAS Borla^@508@^http://www.borla.com/products/mustang_cobra_catback_exhaust_touring_part__14858.html^@^Mustang Cobra 1999-2004 Cat-Back™ Exhaust Touring part # 14858^@14858@^Cat-Back™ Exhaust^@^Once again Ford has raised the performance bar with the 1999-04 Supercharged 390-horsepower Mustang Cobra. And BORLA® Performance Industries chosen by Ford SVT as the factory exhaust on the last Mustang Cobra R has updated it further with a high tec  custom tuned exhaust. BORLA® Engineers massaged and balanced the complete system based on the Ford ECU Strategy that allows the engine to breath free without interrupting the careful balance of on-board engine management. The Cat-Back™ system (PN 140052) is full dual with 2.5” aerospace grade high quality austenitic stainless steel mandrel bends and generates a straight-through performance based exhaust flow that not only brings the best out of the new Cobra Mustang but also gives that extra capacity for additional aftermarket performance upgrades down the road. Make no mistake this is an aggressive system and proclaims pure power. We also offer a more BORLA® traditional system based on the Cobra R system (PN 14858) that is less aggressive but with solid performance gains. Both systems are real winners. Recent independent dyno tests showed gains of over 35 horsepower. Amazon Racing showed gains of over 40 horsepower by installing the new BORLA® 140052 system on a ’03 Cobra with a DiabloSport Chip and a power pulley. BORLA® Performance Industries the original pioneers of aerospace-grade high quality austenitic stainless steel (superior to T-409 or aluminized steel) free flow exhaust utilizes its patented award and race winning technology to deliver quality sound performance gains and enhanced fuel economy – all with an easy bolt-on installation. All BORLA® street products carry the famous BORLA® written million-mile warranty.  ...Read More^@^http://www.borla.com/productImages/misc/14858_vehicle_lg.jpg^@^http://www.borla.com/productImages/misc/14858_th_vehicle_sm.jpg

column1: @509@^GAS Borla^@^GAS Borla^@509@^http://www.borla.com/products/mustang_gt_catback_exhaust_atak_part__140382.html^@^Mustang GT 2005-2009 Cat-Back™ Exhaust ATAK® part # 140382^@140382@^Cat-Back™ Exhaust^@^BORLA® has developed a revolutionary new exhaust technology that enables our engineers to deliver unprecedented vehicle-specific control over the acoustical note of an exhaust throughout the RPM range while retaining 100% of the power-adding capabil ties of BORLA®’s patented multicore design. Called ATAK®™ (Acoustically-Tuned Applied Kinetics) this new technology produces the highest available dB (decibel) levels in the BORLA® street-legal lineup and is designed for high-performance purists who prefer exhaust notes over their stereos. The focus of ATAK®™ is to pump the volume while retaining clarity of sound avoiding distortion typically found in louder exhausts. With ATAK®™ the sound output is tuned like a graphic equalizer to shape and focus sound waves for optimum high-volume output. The development of each ATAK®™ system begins with extensive study of each vehicle’s acoustical properties. The technology is based on custom-tuned attributes of the internal muffler cores which are calibrated on a vehicle-by-vehicle basis to deliver the most desirable sound. Like all BORLA® exhaust products each system is handmade in the USA by master craftspeople and features premium 300-Series high-quality austenitic stainless steel construction ultra-smooth mandrel bent piping mirror-polished tips and a Million-Mile Warranty. X-Pipe (PN 60092) may be added to this system.  ...Read More^@^http://www.borla.com/productImages/misc/140382_vehicle_lg.jpg^@^http://www.borla.com/productImages/misc/140382_th_vehicle_sm.jpg

column1: @510@^GAS Borla^@^GAS Borla^@510@^http://www.borla.com/products/shelby_mustang_gt500_catback_exhaust_stype_part__140500.html^@^Shelby Mustang GT500 2013-2014 Cat-Back™ Exhaust S-Type part # 140500^@140500@^Cat-Back™ Exhaust^@^Since mid-1964 Mustang has always been about muscle looks and loads of customization options. BORLA®’s lineup for the 2010 Mustang GT and Shelby GT500 lives up to this legacy with systems to meet a wide variety of performance goals and budgets. Fo soundaholic Mustang GT drivers who won’t settle for anything less than unbridled performance with a pure aggressive pony car growl BORLA® offers a Cat-Back™ (PN140318) and rear section (PN11777) system each featuring BORLA®’s cylindrical S-Type mufflers. Both are also available with BORLA®’s more sound-absorbing Touring mufflers (PN140319) and (PN11778) for sleeper fans who prefer to be more subtle about their power upgrades. Responding to the high-output exhaust needs of the supercharged 2010 Shelby GT500 BORLA® engineers developed a specially-tuned Multicore Cat-Back™ system (PN140320) which includes an X-Pipe. BORLA®’s patented high-velocity Multicore design distributes exhaust gases through multiple straight-through perforated cores. A race-tested innovation Multicore technology is also utilized in BORLA®’s elite XR-1® mufflers used by winning teams in NHRA Baja 1000 and many other racing venues and has been proven to actually outflow a straight pipe. GT500 owners who want the performance boost of a BORLA® exhaust but prefer a sound just slightly louder than stock will find a perfect fit in PN140321 a Touring Cat-Back™ system. All of BORLA®’s 2010 Mustang GT and Shelby GT500 systems feature high-quality austenitic stainless steel construction ultra-smooth mandrel-bent 2.5” tubing flawless welding from master craftsmen mirror-polished 4” diameter angle-cut 12” dual tips with rolled edges and an unrivaled Million Mile Warranty. From the dimensions and perforation patterns of the inner cores to the amount of composite filament packing all specifications of BORLA® mufflers are tuned on a vehicle-by-vehicle basis for an optimum blend of performance and sound. Combined with distinctive motorsport styling easy bolt-on installation and enhanced fuel economy the world’s most winning exhaust continues to lead the industry it founded over 30 years ago.  ...Read More^@^http://www.borla.com/productImages/misc/140500_vehicle_lg.jpg^@^http://www.borla.com/productImages/misc/140500_th_vehicle_sm.jpg

column1: @583@^GAS Borla^@^GAS Borla^@583@^http://www.borla.com/products/e60__525i_530i_catback_exhaust_part__140113.html^@^E60 525i/ 530i 2004-2005 Cat-Back™ Exhaust part # 140113^@140113@^Cat-Back™ Exhaust^@^The long awaited full upgrade to the 5-series BMW has jumped straight to the top of the Luxury Sports Car market and BORLA® Research and Development Engineers have designed a true dual mandrel bent genuine BORLA® Cat-Back™ exhaust system (Part #140113 for the 530i. BORLA® has a 26-year tradition of developing premium performance exhaust for street and race applications. This new system for the BMW 530i is based on existing BORLA® knowledge and extensive testing with the tried and true BMW straight 6 power-plant and in conjunction with leading BMW race teams. Not only has the normal BORLA® performance been achieved but a great new look and sound has also been accomplished including a smooth powerful sound on acceleration with absolutely no in-cabin resonance. In addition to increased power and exhaust flow the new BORLA® full dual system weighs in at an impressive 20 lbs. lighter than the stock single exhaust system. When it seems like it couldn’t get any better BORLA® tops it all off with a pair of beautifully polished BORLA® embossed 3-½” round rolled edge angle-cut stainless steel tips. Once again advanced engineering CNC mandrel bending award winning proprietary designed mufflers and aircraft-grade lightweight high quality austenitic stainless steel combine to deliver another fine exhaust system from the famous BORLA® brand. And as with all our street exhaust BORLA® backs the entire package with an unequaled Million-Mile Warranty with no fine print. Everyone has been waiting for the new 5 series but they don’t have to wait for the added performance of the new BORLA® 530i system

column1: @586@^GAS Borla^@^GAS Borla^@586@^http://www.borla.com/products/e92__335i_335xi_coupe_catback_exhaust_part__140228.html^@^E92 335i/ 335xi Coupe 2007-2010 Cat-Back™ Exhaust part # 140228^@140228@^Cat-Back™ Exhaust^@^Hot ’07-10 BMW Twin Turbo 335i Gets Cool BORLA® Duals Oxnard California - BORLA® Performance Industries is proud to offer a great dual exhaust Cat-Back™ system for the exciting BMW 335i Coupe. With twin turbo chargers this “Bimmer” is the ultimate veryday driver that longs for an open road. The BORLA® Cat-Back™ system incorporates the renowned BORLA® Merge X-Pipe and full length 2-½” performance tubing. The unique BORLA® double crossover muffler is well known for that elite BORLA® growl of performance without in-cabin annoyance. More Power less weight and great sound -- all combined with awesome looking oversized 3-½” polished round rolled edge and angle cut BORLA® premium tips. BORLA® meets the challenge of presenting a true value-added package to this classy luxury sports coupe. BORLA® the original pioneers of high quality austenitic stainless steel (superior to 409 or aluminized steel) free-flow exhaust utilizes patented award and race winning technology to deliver quality sound performance gains and enhanced fuel economy -- all with an easy bolt-on installation. column1: @590@^GAS Borla^@^GAS Borla^@590@^http://www.borla.com/products/e65__745i_745li_catback_exhaust_part__140130.html^@^E65 745i/ 745Li 2002-2005 Cat-Back™ Exhaust part # 140130^@140130@^Cat-Back™ Exhaust^@^BORLA® Performance Industries has long been the performance exhaust of choice for BMW production race cars the Z and M-series hot rods. BORLA® RD Engineers have developed a sophisticated unique exhaust for the 745i 745Li 4.5L V8 for 2002-05. This sys em (PN 140130) is a true dual Cat-Back™ and incorporates a lead muffler that serves both to attenuate sound and balance pressure similar to the X-pipes used on race machines. Augmented with two secondary mufflers and followed up with a rear muffler assembly the system exits with two turned down phantom tips at the rear valence driver side. Among the amazing qualities of the BORLA® system: With all the extra tubing and mufflers this system flows an unheard of 300+cfm more than stock and weighs in at an amazing 21 pounds less than stock -- a true testament to BORLA® engineering which also accounts for the performance gains. The Li model is longer requiring an extension pipe (included in every system). Performance looks better mileage and the right sound….what’s there not to like! BORLA® the original pioneers of aerospace-grade high quality austenitic stainless steel (superior to 409 or aluminized steel) free-flow exhaust utilizes patented award and race winning technology to deliver quality sound performance gains and enhanced fuel economy — all with an easy bolt-on installation and backed by an unsurpassed written Million-Mile Warranty.  ...Read More^@^http://www.borla.com/productImages/misc/140130_vehicle_lg.jpg^@^http://www.borla.com/productImages/misc/140130_th_vehicle_sm.jpg

column1: @606@^GAS Borla^@^GAS Borla^@606@^http://www.borla.com/products/ctsv_coupe_catback_exhaust_part__12662.html^@^CTS-V Coupe 2011-2014 Cat-Back™ Exhaust part # 12662^@12662@^Cat-Back™ Exhaust^@^BORLA®’s “No Drone” Cadillac CTS-V COUPE “Race Only” Exhaust System For Cadillac CTS-V Coupe owners who won’t tolerate any “drone” or interior resonance but expect nothing less than unbridled performance at the race-track and a pure aggressive roar nder acceleration BORLA® offers a complete race exhaust system (PN12662). This system was designed exclusively for racing use and may not be legal for use on public roads in all states. Responding to the high-output exhaust needs of the supercharged 2012 Cadillac CTS-V Coupe BORLA® engineers developed a specially-tuned race exhaust system (12662) which also includes a specially designed hand-made X-Pipe for superior sound and performance. BORLA®’s patented high-velocity muffler design distributes exhaust gases through multiple straight-through perforated cores to ensure maximum performance and an aggressive exhaust note with absolutely no “drone” or interior resonance. A race-tested innovation this technology is also utilized in BORLA®’s elite XR-1® mufflers used by winning teams in ALMS Grand-Am NHRA Baja 1000 TORC and many other racing venues. This BORLA® Exhaust system features high-quality austenitic stainless steel construction ultra-smooth mandrel-bent 2.5” tubing flawless welding from master craftsmen mirror-polished 4.5” diameter angle-cut dual tips with rolled edges and an unrivaled Million Mile Warranty. From the dimensions and perforation patterns of the inner cores to the amount of composite filament packing all specifications of BORLA® mufflers are tuned on a vehicle-by-vehicle basis for an optimum blend of performance and sound. Combined with distinctive motorsport styling easy bolt-on installation and enhanced fuel economy the world’s most winning exhaust continues to lead the industry it founded over 30 years ago. For more information about BORLA® products visit www.BORLA®.com. Or call toll free 1-800-GO BORLA®  ...Read More^@^http://www.borla.com/productImages/misc/12662_vehicle_lg.jpg^@^http://www.borla.com/productImages/misc/12662_th_vehicle_sm.jpg

With the 2005 Grand Cherokee BORLA® R&D engineers developed a direct bolt-on exhaust that being manufactured out of lightweight aircraft grade T-304 stainless steel approaches half the weight of the stock system. This system also features oversized tubing and a 14” long BORLA® embossed 4” round rolled fully polished tip. Part #140158 exhibits a great V8 growl significant performance upgrades and perhaps an even more interesting attribute today – increased fuel mileage. BORLA® prides manufacturing all exhaust components from the aircraft grade T-304 stainless steel which is extremely durable and ideal for the off-road as well as normal highway use. BORLA® backs up the quality of their exhaust with the best warranty in the industry. No trick words or hidden phrases to mislead just a simple Million Miles on the entire BORLA® exhaust. column1: @634@^GAS Borla^@^GAS Borla^@634@^http://www.borla.com/products/gti_catback_exhaust_part__140248.html^@^GTI 2006-2009 Cat-Back™ Exhaust part # 140248^@140248@^Cat-Back™ Exhaust^@^The GTI is turbocharged and has factory performance that is a real surprise. BORLA® often touts their racing heritage and the Volkswagen Company has a grand racing legacy. Some may be unaware that the Audi and Bentley who have dominated LeMans are olkswagen companies. The BORLA® Cat-Back™ (PN140248) system utilizes 2½” tubing and straight-through performance mufflers fitting both the 2 4 door models. This BORLA® system makes nice power and has a great sound that resembles some of the high-end Euro luxury cars costing better than double. Weighing in at 30% less than the factory system this slick BORLA® exhaust is completed with a pair of 3.15” round fully polished tips. The VW GTi is a great bang for the buck and a quality BORLA® Exhaust just makes it better. BORLA® the original pioneers of high quality austenitic stainless steel (superior to 409 or aluminized steel) free-flow exhaust utilizes patented award and race winning technology to deliver quality sound performance gains and enhanced fuel economy — all with an easy bolt-on installation. Just to show BORLA® believes in their products they back every street system with an unsurpassed written million-mile warranty.  ...Read More^@^http://www.borla.com/productImages/misc/140248_xlarge.jpg^@^http://www.borla.com/productImages/misc/140248_large.jpg
column3: /tip_35_th.jpg^@@@^2006-2009^@^Fits these Vehicles 2006-2009 Volkswagen GTI 2.0L Turbo 4cyl FWD Auto/Manual 2/4-Door^@

column1: @635@^GAS Borla^@^GAS Borla^@635@^http://www.borla.com/products/gti_catback_exhaust_part__140347.html^@^GTI 2010-2014 Cat-Back™ Exhaust part # 140347^@140347@^Cat-Back™ Exhaust^@^The all-new VW 2010 GTI Mark VI edition is ahead of the curve for VW enthusiasts and BORLA®’s commitment to this marque is evident in newly released PN140347. This BORLA® Cat-Back™ Exhaust for the “original hot hatch” is a high-performance single muf ler system with patented technology that offers more power when you want it improved fuel economy when you need it. Superior-quality austenitic stainless steel is high on looks and durability yet low on weight for more spirited driving. Add the BORLA® “sound of power” and aggressive dual 4” polished exhaust tips and the result is a whole new driving experience. From the design characteristics of the inner cores to the amount of sound-absorbing composite filament all specifications of BORLA® exhaust systems are tuned on a vehicle-by-vehicle basis for an optimum blend of performance and sound. Combined with an unrivalled Million Mile Warranty distinctive motorsport styling and easy bolt-on installation the world’s most winning exhaust continues to lead the industry it founded over 30 years ago.  ...Read More^@^http://www.borla.com/productImages/misc/140347_vehicle_lg.jpg^@^http://www.borla.com/productImages/misc/140347_th_vehicle_sm.jpg

column1: @639@^GAS Borla^@^GAS Borla^@639@^http://www.borla.com/products/cayman_cayman_s_boxster_boxster_s_catback_exhaust_part__12653.html^@^Cayman/ Cayman S/ Boxster/ Boxster S 2005-2008 Cat-Back™ Exhaust part # 12653^@12653@^Cat-Back™ Exhaust^@^BORLA® Performance loves to race cars. Much of its 30-year legacy is intertwined with serious racing vehicles and the exhaust systems and headers that propel them. From LeMans to Baja BORLA® has never run from a fight -- the cauldron of competition is in the BORLA® DNA. That passion has spearheaded the new Cayman S exhaust systems. Developed to support our race teams that demand a quality system that performs at high levels with extreme endurance. The Race System (PN12653) features 4” fully polished tips
column2: the Enduro system (PN12654) features 3-½” polished tips. Both systems are intended for racing and are not legal for highway use. Both systems are BORLA® logo embossed and make outstanding power. And when BORLA® says that you know you can take it to the bank. The test team that drove the Cayman S project cars during development all exited with big smiles and a happy foot. Enhanced Power the Right Sound on a Great Car can’t be beat. It takes enthusiasts to build quality components and BORLA® people from the owners down are Porsche owners and true enthusiasts. BORLA® the original pioneers of high quality austenitic stainless steel (superior to 409 or aluminized steel) free-flow exhaust utilizes patented award and race winning technology to deliver quality sound performance gains and enhanced fuel economy -- all with an easy bolt-on installation. And backed by an unsurpassed written million-mile warranty.  ...Read More^@^http://www.borla.com/productImages/misc/12653_vehicle_lg.jpg^@^http://www.borla.com/productImages/misc/12653_th_vehicle_sm.jpg

Incorporating smooth CNC mandrel bends and award-winning free flowing mufflers allows BORLA® to create a masterpiece of advanced engineered exhaust for your Jeep Wrangler Limited. This system is cleverly designed to clear the factory installed trailer hitch with no modifications. Jeep owners are known for durability testing their vehicle and aftermarket components and this is one reason top Jeep tuners and race teams turn to BORLA® for performance design sound and endurance. BORLA® doesn’t take short cuts. They build it to win Baja or to commute 40000 miles a year. When you see that polished tip with BORLA® embossed on it you know it is the best you can get. BORLA® has a 27-year tradition of building performance exhaust for Chrysler products from the Hemi to the Viper and Wrangler. BORLA® the original pioneers of aerospace-grade T-304 stainless steel (superior to T-409 or aluminized steel) free-flow exhaust utilizes its patented award and race-winning technology to deliver quality sound performance gains and enhanced fuel economy – all with an easy bolt-on installation. All BORLA® street products carry the famous BORLA® written million-mile warranty.  ...Read More^@^http://www.borla.com/productImages/misc/140103_vehicle_lg.jpg^@^http://www.borla.com/productImages/misc/140103_th_vehicle_sm.jpg

column1: @672@^GAS Borla^@^GAS Borla^@672@^http://www.borla.com/products/c6_corvette_catback_exhaust_atak_part__140453.html^@^C6 Corvette 2005-2008 Cat-Back™ Exhaust ATAK® part # 140453^@140453@^Cat-Back™ Exhaust^@^BORLA® has announced the development of a revolutionary new exhaust technology that enables their engineers to deliver unprecedented vehicle-specific control over the acoustical note of an exhaust throughout the RPM range while retaining 100% of the power-adding capabilities of BORLA®’s patented Multicore design. Called ATAK®™ (Acoustically-Tuned Applied Kinetics) this exclusive technology (U.S. patent #5248859) produces the highest available dB (decibel) levels in the BORLA® street-legal lineup and is designed for high-performance purists who prefer exhaust notes over their stereos. The focus of ATAK®™ is to pump the volume while retaining clarity of sound at the same time avoiding the drone and distortion typically found in louder exhausts. With ATAK®™ the sound output is tuned like a graphic equalizer to shape and focus sound waves for optimum high-volume output. The development of each ATAK®™ system begins with extensive study of each vehicle’s acoustical properties. The technology is based on custom-tuned attributes of the internal muffler cores which are calibrated on a vehicle-by-vehicle basis to deliver the most desirable sound. BORLA® is now shipping Cat-Back™ and/or Rear Section ATAK®™ exhaust systems for a wide variety of popular applications such as Mustang (including 2011 GT V6) Camaro Corvette Challenger GTR and more in development. This ATAK® system has been specifically tuned for the '05-'08 Corvette C6. Like all BORLA® exhaust products each system is handmade in the USA by master craftspeople and features premium 300-Series austenitic stainless steel construction mandrel bending by computer-controlled CNC machinery to ensure maximum flow and a perfect fit mirror-polished tips and a Million-Mile Warranty.  ...Read More^@^http://www.borla.com/productImages/misc/140453_vehicle_lg.jpg^@^http://www.borla.com/productImages/misc/140453_th_vehicle_sm.jpg

column1: @678@^GAS Borla^@^GAS Borla^@678@^http://www.borla.com/products/c6_corvette_catback_exhaust_stype_classic_part__140131.html^@^C6 Corvette 2005-2008 Cat-Back™ Exhaust S-Type Classic part # 140131^@140131@^Cat-Back™ Exhaust^@^BORLA® Performance has once again proven why we’ve have led the aftermarket performance exhaust industry for nearly 30 years. BORLA® has an exalted heritage with Chevrolet performance vehicles. From the C5R LeMans winning Corvettes to privateers like K EC Pratt-Miller Lingenfelter and Lou Gigliotti who have enhanced BORLA®’s knowledge of both the vehicle dynamics and the power-plant engineering. The new C6 is a muscle car with a big powerful engine on a sophisticated sexy chassis. BORLA® has always used the transfer of technology from racing to the street as a tool and the C5 C6 and Z06 play right into that wheelhouse. With an experienced RD staff the BORLA® team has given the Chevrolet mark the attention it deserves by rolling out several new systems for the Corvette. Airflow management and exhaust engineering is a science with which BORLA® has more experience than anyone in the exhaust aftermarket. BORLA® offers a variety of options for the C5 C6 and Z06. Choose from several tip styles and muffler designs. Cat-Back™s™ and Rear Sections are available with either the highly popular “S-Type” muffler or the “Touring” muffler. The “S-Type” is a smaller round muffler with a center-in/center-out configuration giving a more aggressive sound and higher flow. For those who prefer it on the milder side we have the “Touring” muffler -- a larger case producing less aggressive sound. Some come with an assortment of tip designs. BORLA® Performance Industries the original pioneers of aerospace-grade high quality austenitic stainless steel (superior to 409 or aluminized steel) free-flow exhaust utilizes patented award and race winning technology to deliver quality sound performance gains and enhanced fuel economy — all with an easy bolt-on installation. All BORLA® street products carry an unsurpassed written million-mile warranty.  ...Read More^@^http://www.borla.com/productImages/misc/140131_vehicle_lg.jpg^@^http://www.borla.com/productImages/misc/140131_th_vehicle_sm.jpg

column1: @679@^GAS Borla^@^GAS Borla^@679@^http://www.borla.com/products/c6_corvette_z06_c6_corvette_zr1_catback_exhaust_stype_classic_part__140191.html^@^C6 Corvette Z06/ C6 Corvette ZR1 2006-2011 Cat-Back™ Exhaust S-Type Classic part # 140191^@140191@^Cat-Back™ Exhaust^@^BORLA® Performance has once again proven why we’ve have led the aftermarket performance exhaust industry for nearly 30 years. BORLA® has an exalted heritage with Chevrolet performance vehicles. From the C5R LeMans winning Corvettes to privateers like K EC Pratt-Miller Lingenfelter and Lou Gigliotti who have enhanced BORLA®’s knowledge of both the vehicle dynamics and the power-plant engineering. The new C6 is a muscle car with a big powerful engine on a sophisticated sexy chassis. BORLA® has always used the transfer of technology from racing to the street as a tool and the C5 C6 and Z06 play right into that wheelhouse. With an experienced RD staff the BORLA® team has given the Chevrolet mark the attention it deserves by rolling out several new systems for the Corvette. Airflow management and exhaust engineering is a science with which BORLA® has more experience than anyone in the exhaust aftermarket. BORLA® offers a variety of options for the C5 C6 and Z06. Choose from several tip styles and muffler designs. Cat-Back™s™ and Rear Sections are available with either the highly popular “S-Type” muffler or the “Touring” muffler. The “S-Type” is a smaller round muffler with a center-in/center-out configuration giving a more aggressive sound and higher flow. For those who prefer it on the milder side we have the “Touring” muffler -- a larger case producing less aggressive sound. Some come with an assortment of tip designs. Part No. 140191 details: 3” X pipe assembly followed by a 3.00” left and right extension pipe. Connecting to the extension pipes are two 3” over-axle pipes followed by the rear muffler assembly which consists of two 3” muffler inlet pipes and two 5” diameter X 10” long round “S” style mufflers. Exiting each muffler is a 3” outlet pipe leading to a collector which splits into two 2” pipes. Connected to each pipe are the single 4.25” diameter X 4” long round rolled edge angle-cut intercooled split rear tips. RD Test Results show flows of up to 100cfm more than the factory exhaust (for a total flow of 1199 cfm ^@^ 50” H2O). Weight Comparison: 44 lbs. while the factory system weights in at 71 lbs. Sound: 108.725 dba using SAE standard J1169 which is 12.1 dba louder than the factory exhaust. Horsepower/Torque Data: Using a Dyno Jet 248 Chassis Dynamometer we have seen gains of up to 24 additional horsepower and 24 additional ft. lbs. torque. BORLA® Performance Industries the original pioneers of high quality austenitic stainless steel (superior to 409 or aluminized steel) free-flow exhaust utilizes patented award and race winning technology to deliver quality sound performance gains and enhanced fuel economy — all with an easy bolt-on installation. All BORLA® street products carry an unsurpassed written million-mile warranty.  ...Read More^@^C6 Corvette Z06/ C6 Corvette ZR1 2006-2011 Cat-Back Exhaust S-Type Classic part # 140191^@^http://www.borla.com/productImages/misc/140191_th_vehicle_sm.jpg

column1: @685@^GAS Borla^@^GAS Borla^@685@^http://www.borla.com/products/c6_corvette_z06_c6_corvette_zr1_catback_exhaust_multicore_part__140265.html^@^C6 Corvette Z06/ C6 Corvette ZR1 2006-2011 Cat-Back™ Exhaust Multi-Core part # 140265^@140265@^Cat-Back™ Exhaust^@^BORLA® Performance has been involved in racing Corvettes for over 30 years from the legendary ALMS Corvettes that first won LeMans to Lou Gigliotti and John Lingenfelter. Almost everyone admits the C6/Z06 is a true Supercar. Some customers asked BORL to tame down the 3” exhaust but BORLA® didn’t want to loose any of the performance gains they had worked so hard for in the very popular S-type package. How to keep the power while making the sound less aggressive? The answer came from one of our race teams who advised they were running BORLA® XR-1® Multi-Core Mufflers on their 800 HP racer in order to concentrate better and hear all the radio. The BORLA® RD lab tried it and found an awesome sophisticated smooth sound with equal power and even a gain in torque (PN 140265). It proved even to us why Alex BORLA® was awarded the only U.S. Patent for this clever design. BORLA® is the only company that can manufacture Multi-Core Mufflers -- The Winningest Mufflers in Racing. It only stands to reason that one of the true icons of the Muscle Car era should have the best engineered racing muffler of all time transport the growl of 500 plus ponies. Some say the 60’s were the hay-day of performance street cars. They are wrong. Today is that day. The best engineered designed performing race-bred street cars of all time are built today. It just seems right that for a car this good you step up to BORLA®. From Baja to Bonneville from Indy to LeMans from Top Fuel to TransAm and almost every type of racing in between Champions Choose BORLA®.  ...Read More^@^http://www.borla.com/productImages/misc/140265_vehicle_lg.jpg^@^http://www.borla.com/productImages/misc/140265_th_vehicle_sm.jpg
column5: /tip_19_th.jpg^@@@^2006-2011^@^Fits these Vehicles 2006-2011 Chevrolet Corvette Z06/ZR1 (C6 Z06/C6 ZR1) 7.0L/6.2L V8 Manual Trans RWD 2DR Coupe^@

column1: @686@^GAS Borla^@^GAS Borla^@686@^http://www.borla.com/products/c6_corvette_z06_c6_corvette_zr1_catback_exhaust_touring_part__140192.html^@^C6 Corvette Z06/ C6 Corvette ZR1 2006-2011 Cat-Back™ Exhaust Touring part # 140192^@140192@^Cat-Back™ Exhaust^@^BORLA® Performance has once again proven why we’ve have led the aftermarket performance exhaust industry for nearly 30 years. BORLA® has an exalted heritage with Chevrolet performance vehicles. From the C5R LeMans winning Corvettes to privateers like K EC Pratt-Miller Lingenfelter and Lou Gigliotti who have enhanced BORLA®’s knowledge of both the vehicle dynamics and the power-plant engineering. The new C6 is a muscle car with a big powerful engine on a sophisticated sexy chassis. BORLA® has always used the transfer of technology from racing to the street as a tool and the C5 C6 and Z06 play right into that wheelhouse. With an experienced RD staff the BORLA® team has given the Chevrolet mark the attention it deserves by rolling out several new systems for the Corvette. Airflow management and exhaust engineering is a science with which BORLA® has more experience than anyone in the exhaust aftermarket. BORLA® offers a variety of options for the C5 C6 and Z06. Choose from several tip styles and muffler designs. Cat-Back™s™ and Rear Sections are available with either the highly popular “S-Type” muffler or the “Touring” muffler. The “S-Type” is a smaller round muffler with a center-in/center-out configuration giving a more aggressive sound and higher flow. For those who prefer it on the milder side we have the “Touring” muffler -- a larger case producing less aggressive sound. Some come with an assortment of tip designs. BORLA® Performance Industries the original pioneers of aerospace-grade high quality austenitic stainless steel (superior to 409 or aluminized steel) free-flow exhaust utilizes patented award and race winning technology to deliver quality sound performance gains and enhanced fuel economy — all with an easy bolt-on installation. All BORLA® street products carry an unsurpassed written million-mile warranty.  ...Read More^@^http://www.borla.com/productImages/misc/140192_vehicle_lg.jpg^@^http://www.borla.com/productImages/misc/140192_th_vehicle_sm.jpg

column1: @695@^GAS Borla^@^GAS Borla^@695@^http://www.borla.com/products/impreza_catback_exhaust_part__140263.html^@^Impreza 2006-2007 Cat-Back™ Exhaust part # 140263^@140263@^Cat-Back™ Exhaust^@^BORLA® Performance Industries engineering staff has developed several clever exhaust packages for the exciting new Subaru Impreza WRX line. BORLA® has an impressive legacy with the WRX from hot street cars to all out racers. The ’07 Impreza system (PN 140263) has been very popular. Now the new ’08 Cat-Back™ systems for both the Sedan (PN 140264) and the Hatchback (PN 140271). The new turbo-charged WRX enjoys the straight-through BORLA® exhaust with added power and a sound that makes passers by think it is a high-end European Sports Sedan (but at half the cost!). This little bullet is no longer the best kept secret at the stoplight but still a surprise to the uninitiated. The Sedan features full 3” tubing splitting to two 2” pipes and two race-bred competition designed mufflers exiting at the bumper with large 4” round polished tips. With this dynamic BORLA® system installed this all-wheel drive hot rod has a classy look powerful sound and impressive performance most would envy. The Hatchback (140271) system incorporates the 3” tubing and single exit but almost the same power gains as the split rear system. Both units are about 3 db louder than the factory sound and exhibit weight savings of over 30% over stock thanks to the lightweight yet durable stainless steel BORLA® incorporates in every genuine BORLA® Exhaust.  ...Read More^@^http://www.borla.com/productImages/misc/140263_vehicle_lg.jpg^@^http://www.borla.com/productImages/misc/140263_th_vehicle_sm.jpg

column1: @698@^GAS Borla^@^GAS Borla^@698@^http://www.borla.com/products/ram_1500_catback_exhaust_part__140111.html^@^Ram 1500 2004-2005 Cat-Back™ Exhaust part # 140111^@140111@^Cat-Back™ Exhaust^@^BORLA® Performance Industries releases a performance Cat-Back™ exhaust upgrade (PN140111) for the new Dodge Ram SRT-10 Supertruck. BORLA® has a long tradition of building Mopar performance exhaust. From Viper race cars to street Hemi powered trucks. Th demands of the V-10 high horsepower engine fit right into what BORLA® does best. The SRT-10 is one of the hottest vehicles on the road today car or truck. BORLA® has developed a free flowing performance exhaust that has significantly better air flow while weighing in almost 20 pounds lighter than the stock unit. Increased flow is managed by large tubing smooth mandrel bends and straight through race bred mufflers. BORLA® constantly impresses the uninitiated with so much seat-of-the-pants performance and soundpower with the elimination of cabin resonance. The secret is simple and complicated at the same time. The simple answer is experience. Over a quarter of a century at building exhaust systems for race cars and hot muscle cars. The complicated part is the reason BORLA® has patents and treats the R&D department like Fort Knox. Bottom line is more power awesome sound great look with the polished oversized BORLA® embossed tips and a million mile warranty. What’s there not to like? BORLA® the original pioneers of aerospace-grade T-304 stainless steel (superior to 409 or aluminized steel) free-flow exhaust utilizes patented award and race winning technology to deliver quality sound performance gains and enhanced fuel economy — all with an easy bolt-on installation. Unsurpassed written million-mile warranty.  ...Read More^@^http://www.borla.com/productImages/misc/140111_vehicle_lg.jpg^@^http://www.borla.com/productImages/misc/140111_th_vehicle_sm.jpg

The plan was to develop a full BORLA® dual exhaust Cat-Back™ with split side exit. The BORLA® system (PN140238) filled the bill giving the Toyota a reat look pure performance V-8 growl and a nice performance kick. The full dual system even weighs less than the factory single system thanks to the lightweight stainless steel fabrication and not surprisingly out flows the stock exhaust. This BORLA® dual system even exhibits better fuel economy numbers which in these times of $3+ a gallon fuel is certainly a nice attribute for a big truck. BORLA® the original pioneers of high quality austenitic stainless steel (superior to 409 or aluminized steel) free-flow exhaust utilizes patented award and race winning technology to deliver quality sound performance gains and enhanced fuel economy -- all with an easy bolt-on installation. @726@^GAS Borla^@^GAS Borla^@726@^http://www.borla.com/products/c4_corvette_catback_exhaust_stype_part__140082.html^@^C4 Corvette 1986-1991 Cat-Back™ Exhaust S-Type part # 140082^@140082@^Cat-Back™ Exhaust^@^BORLA® PERFORMANCE introduces a new system for the celebrated 1986-1991 C4 Corvette equipped with a 5.7L V-8 engine. BORLA® has engineered this Cat-Back™ system to work with either the popular manual transmission or the automatic. The high quality aus inetic stainless steel system is easy to bolt on is a direct replacement for the much heavier (by some 20lbs.!) stock system and is based off the big brother C5/Z06 system known as the "Stinger". A 3" diameter front pipe is mounted just after the catalytic converter leading to a Y-pipe which splits into two 2-1/2" pipes exiting on each side of the rear. The muffler and tip assembly use a 10"x 5" diameter round muffler on each side of the vehicle with your choice of a polished rectangular rolled edge angle cut tailpipe tip at each split rear exit (part # 140082) – or a polished round rolled angle cut phantom tip at each split rear exit (part #140051). Tests have shown an exciting 41% increase in flow for dramatic improvement in power or fuel economy. That now famous aggressive BORLA® growl and sexy look proclaim this block may be small but it means all business – we guarantee it for a million miles! With race-bred technology that has been transferred from the many successful BORLA® race programs it was no accident that this BORLA® system has won several major Corvette exhaust shootouts. Included in this great and storied past are such famous efforts as the C5-R Race Team that has dominated LeMans along with the new Bondurant Corvette program at the Bob Bondurant School of High Performance Driving. Only what you would expect from BORLA® the most winning exhaust in racing.  ...Read More^@^http://www.borla.com/productImages/misc/140082_vehicle_lg.jpg^@^http://www.borla.com/productImages/misc/140082_th_vehicle_sm.jpg

column1: @730@^GAS Borla^@^GAS Borla^@730@^http://www.borla.com/products/mini_cooper_s_catback_exhaust_stype_part__140119.html^@^Mini Cooper S 2004-2006 Cat-Back™ Exhaust S-Type part # 140119^@140119@^Cat-Back™ Exhaust^@^It seems logical that the age-old axiom “great things come in small packages” was imported to America from Europe. Few vehicles have ever lived up to that byline better than the BMW Mini Cooper. This incredible vehicle is both nimble and powerful an the supercharged 163-HP engine almost demands a new BORLA® stainless steel Cat-Back™ exhaust system. The unique posture of this race-bred European saloon touring car is well documented and complimenting BMW engineering and high output engine with the free breathing mandrel-bent genuine BORLA® Cat-Back™ system with BORLA® custom-tuned performance muffler gives this little parcel of dynamite some real attitude. BORLA® offers a system for the 2002-04 Mini Cooper base model (Part #140030) as well as a choice of 4 systems for the S Series
column2: Part #140027 for 2002-03 #140120 for 2004-05 and more aggressive sounding “race” systems (Part #140035 for 2002-03 #140119 for 2004-05). All BORLA® exhaust components are tuned for maximum output from any other aftermarket performance upgrade. BORLA® features aircraft quality high quality austenitic stainless steel (superior to 409 or aluminized) mandrel bent tubing with race-bred straight-through mufflers unduplicated great BORLA® sound of power backed by an unsurpassed written Million-Mile Warranty. Genuine BORLA® see it hear it feel it … then you too will know why Winner’s Choose BORLA®!  ...Read More^@^http://www.borla.com/productImages/misc/140119_vehicle_lg.jpg^@^http://www.borla.com/productImages/misc/140119_th_vehicle_sm.jpg

column1: @734@^GAS Borla^@^GAS Borla^@734@^http://www.borla.com/products/mini_cooper_clubman_s_catback_exhaust_stype_part__140289.html^@^Mini Cooper Clubman S 2008-2011 Cat-Back™ Exhaust S-Type part # 140289^@140289@^Cat-Back™ Exhaust^@^BORLA® Performance announces a tuned Cat-Back™ (PN140289) for the turbocharged BMW powered Mini called the Clubman S. This innovative system once again calls on the BORLA® racing teams for field engineering and testing to produce a nifty system that in reases horsepower torque saves weight and provides some of the best sounding exhaust notes a 1.6L engine has ever made. The system splits before the rear axle to exit with two 4" round rolled edge angle cut polished tips. Once again BORLA® scores with the kind of system you have grown to expect from the Leader on the Track and on the Street with High-End Genuine Stainless Steel Cat-Back™ Exhaust. BORLA® the original pioneers of high quality austenitic stainless steel (superior to 409 or aluminized steel) free-flow exhaust utilizes patented award and race winning technology to deliver quality sound performance gains and enhanced fuel economy — all with an easy bolt-on installation. All street systems are back with an unsurpassed written million-mile warranty.  ...Read More^@^http://www.borla.com/productImages/misc/140289_vehicle_lg.jpg^@^http://www.borla.com/productImages/misc/140289_th_vehicle_sm.jpg

column1: @741@^GAS Borla^@^GAS Borla^@741@^http://www.borla.com/products/c5_corvette_c5_corvette_z06_catback_exhaust_part__12649.html^@^C5 Corvette/ C5 Corvette Z06 1997-2004 Cat-Back™ Exhaust part # 12649^@12649@^Cat-Back™ Exhaust^@^BORLA® Performance Industries has once again proven why we’ve have led the aftermarket performance exhaust industry for nearly 30 years. Choose from several tip styles and muffler designs. Cat-Back™s™ and Rear Sections are available with either the highly popular “S-Type” muffler or the “Touring” muffler. The “S-Type” is a smaller round muffler with a center-in/center-out configuration giving a more aggressive sound and higher flow. For those who prefer it on the milder side we have the “Touring” muffler -- a larger case producing less aggressive sound. Some come with an assortment of tip designs. BORLA® Performance Industries the original pioneers of high quality austinetic stainless steel (superior to 409 or aluminized steel) free-flow exhaust utilizes patented award and race winning technology to deliver quality sound performance gains and enhanced fuel economy — all with an easy bolt-on installation. All BORLA® street products carry an unsurpassed written million-mile warranty.  ...Read More^@^http://www.borla.com/productImages/misc/12649_vehicle_lg.jpg^@^http://www.borla.com/productImages/misc/12649_th_vehicle_sm.jpg

column1: @743@^GAS Borla^@^GAS Borla^@743@^http://www.borla.com/products/c5_corvette_c5_corvette_z06_catback_exhaust_stype_classic_part__140017.html^@^C5 Corvette/ C5 Corvette Z06 1997-2004 Cat-Back™ Exhaust S-Type Classic part # 140017^@140017@^Cat-Back™ Exhaust^@^BORLA® Performance has created quite a buzz with Vette owners! This incredibly popular 2-tip Cat-Back™ (PN140017 - dubbed the “Stinger” on the Internet) features "S-Type" muffers smaller round mufflers with a center-in/center-out configuration giving a more aggressive sound and higher flow. BORLA® offers a variety of options for the C5 C6 and Z06. Choose from several tip styles and muffler designs. Cat-Back™s™ and Rear Sections are available with either the highly popular “S-Type” muffler or the “Touring” muffler. The “S-Type” is a smaller round muffler with a center-in/center-out configuration giving a more aggressive sound and higher flow. For those who prefer it on the milder side we have the “Touring” muffler -- a larger case producing less aggressive sound. Some come with an assortment of tip designs. Across the country engine builders Corvette shops and enthusiasts have proclaimed the “S-Type” by BORLA® as “the system no one can beat”. BORLA® has once again set the pace in the Corvette performance exhaust world. Others only wish they were genuine BORLA®. The horsepower is incredible but the BORLA® growl similar to a NASCAR backing off for a hard turn at Daytona is the part that puts a smile on everyone’s face. It just says POWER. Make no mistake -- this is an aggressive exhaust system. Not for sissies. BORLA® the original pioneers of high quality austinetic stainless steel (superior to 400 series and aluminized steel) free flow exhaust utilizes its patented award and race winning technology to deliver quality durability sound performance gains and enhanced fuel economy. All BORLA® street products are assembled in the USA and carry the famous BORLA® written Million-Mile Warranty.  ...Read More^@^http://www.borla.com/productImages/misc/140017_vehicle_lg.jpg^@^http://www.borla.com/productImages/misc/140017_th_vehicle_sm.jpg

column1: @746@^GAS Borla^@^GAS Borla^@746@^http://www.borla.com/products/camaro_ss_wground_effects_package_catback_exhaust_atak_part__140378.html^@^Camaro SS w/Ground Effects Package 2010-2013 Cat-Back™ Exhaust ATAK® part # 140378^@140378@^Cat-Back™ Exhaust^@^This is BORLA®’s® complete Cat-Back™ © system including “X” pipe and “ATAK®” mufflers for the Camaro SS equipped with factory ground effects. BORLA® has developed a revolutionary new exhaust technology that enables our engineers to deliver unprecedente vehicle-specific control over the acoustical note of an exhaust throughout the RPM range while retaining 100% of the power-adding capabilities of BORLA®’s patented multicore design. Called ATAK®™ (Acoustically-Tuned Applied Kinetics) this new technology produces the highest available dB (decibel) levels in the BORLA® street-legal lineup and is designed for high-performance purists who prefer exhaust notes over their stereos. The focus of ATAK®™ is to pump the volume while retaining clarity of sound avoiding distortion typically found in louder exhausts. With ATAK®™ the sound output is tuned like a graphic equalizer to shape and focus sound waves for optimum high-volume output. The development of each ATAK®™ system begins with extensive study of each vehicle’s acoustical properties. The technology is based on custom-tuned attributes of the internal muffler cores which are calibrated on a vehicle-by-vehicle basis to deliver the most desirable sound. A complete technology overview with extensive video footage of launch drive-by and in-cabin sounds with a 2010 Camaro SS can be viewed at www.youtube.com/BORLA®. “The distance from the exhaust manifold to the rear bumper the shape of the underbody shielding the amount of ground clearance all these factors affect the sound and they’re different on each vehicle. With ATAK®™ we take all this into account and the result will blow you away” says company Sales Marketing Manager David BORLA®. Several BORLA® ATAK®™ systems are currently available. For the 2010 6.2L V8 Camaro there is a Cat-Back™ systems (PN 140356 and 140378) and Rear Section (PN 11788) for models without the “Ground Effects” option and a rear section (PN 11794) designed to complement the Ground Effects kit. Like all BORLA® exhaust products each system is handmade in the USA by master craftspeople and features premium 300-Series high-quality austenitic stainless steel construction ultra-smooth mandrel bent piping mirror-polished tips and a Million-Mile Warranty.  ...Read More^@^http://www.borla.com/productImages/misc/140378_vehicle_lg.jpg^@^http://www.borla.com/productImages/misc/140378_th_vehicle_sm.jpg

column1: @10@^GAS Borla^@^GAS Borla^@10@^http://www.borla.com/products/350z_g35_coupe_headers_part__17221.html^@^350Z/ G35 Coupe 2003-2007 Headers part # 17221^@17221@^Headers^@^BORLA® Performance Industries offers an incredible stainless steel exhaust system for the popular Nissan 350Z. BORLA® was among the first with a bona fide performance exhaust upgrade for the original Z cars. The new BORLA® Cat-Back™ System (PN 140045) i a true dual exhaust with the famous BORLA® XR-1® Race-Bred Mufflers. Independent dyno tests have shown incredible gains in the 20+ horsepower range. When complimented with the BORLA® custom fabricated stainless steel high quality austenitic Headers (PN 17221) power numbers as high as 24-horsepower have been observed. Unlike other aftermarket exhaust that actually loose power in mid-range and low end BORLA® gains through the entire RPM range. Serious performance enthusiasts understand that true power gains are not simply a big number at max RPM but rather strong torque gains over the full curve. The famous straight-through patented designs allow BORLA® exhaust incredible flow increases. The Z car flow numbers improved 27% over stock! Flow makes power. Simple as that! The BORLA® true-dual Z-car lightweight high quality austenitic stainless steel system actually weighs 12 pounds less than the factory single exhaust. Add to this package a great look with large 4” angle cut rolled edge polished tips and that famous BORLA® growl. Once again the genuine BORLA® exhaust puts the Zoom in the Z car. Isn’t it time you stepped up to BORLA®? BORLA® Performance Industries the original pioneers of aerospace-grade high quality austenitic stainless steel (superior to T-409 or aluminized steel) free flow exhaust utilizes its patented award and race winning technology to deliver quality sound performance gains and enhanced fuel economy – all with an easy bolt-on installation. All BORLA® street products carry the famous BORLA® written million-mile warranty.  ...Read More^@^http://www.borla.com/productImages/misc/17221_vehicle_lg.jpg^@^http://www.borla.com/productImages/misc/17221_th_vehicle_sm.jpg

column1: @13@^GAS Borla^@^GAS Borla^@13@^http://www.borla.com/products/997_36l_nonturbo_997s_38l_nonturbo_headers_part__17240.html^@^997 3.6L non-turbo/ 997S 3.8L non-turbo 2005-2008 Headers part # 17240^@17240@^Headers^@^BORLA® Performance has rekindled the inborn enthusiasm they have for this high-end sports car Mark with exciting new systems for the venerable Porsche 911 series. As Alex BORLA® describes it “Performance and Racing are in our DNA“. Alex raced factory orsches in Europe owns Porsches and is a strong proponent of their engineering prowess. Just released is (PN17240) the new 1-¾” BORLA® stainless steel headers for the Carrera 997 Models (non-turbo Boxster 6-cylinder engines). These high flow headers are a competition/off-road only unit that is pending EO Emissions Exemption. They are a direct bolt-on to factory cats and can be complimented by several BORLA® Cat-Back™ systems including the PN140233 and PN140234. BORLA® the original pioneers of high quality austenitic stainless steel (superior to 409 or aluminized steel) free-flow exhaust utilizes patented award and race winning technology to deliver quality sound performance gains and enhanced fuel economy -- all with an easy bolt-on installation. And backed by an unsurpassed written million-mile warranty.  ...Read More^@^http://www.borla.com/productImages/misc/17240_vehicle_lg.jpg^@^http://www.borla.com/productImages/misc/17240_th_vehicle_sm.jpg

column1: @99@^GAS Borla^@^GAS Borla^@99@^http://www.borla.com/products/300_srt8_magnum_srt8_charger_srt8_challenger_srt8_headers_part__17250.html^@^300 SRT-8/ Magnum SRT-8/ Charger SRT-8/ Challenger SRT-8 2008-2014 Headers part # 17250^@17250@^Headers^@^BORLA® Performance offers a bold new off-highway race header (PN 17250) for the Dodge Challenger SRT-8. This exciting BORLA® competition stainless steel long tube header features 1-3/4" primaries leading to a four-into-one collector. Exiting the collector is a 2-1/2" outlet pipe. Connecting to each collector outlet pipe using a slip fit is a left and right header outlet pipe each consisting of 2-3/4" tubing. Header outlet pipes allow a factory type slip fit connection to the stock or BORLA® Cat-Back™ Exhaust System (PN 140296).^@^http://www.borla.com/productImages/misc/17250_vehicle_lg.jpg^@^http://www.borla.com/productImages/misc/17250_th_vehicle_sm.jpg

@106@^GAS Borla^@^GAS Borla^@106@^http://www.borla.com/products/shelby_mustang_gt500_headers_part__17238.html^@^Shelby Mustang GT500 2007-2010 Headers part # 17238^@17238@^Headers^@^HEADER W/X-PIPE '07 Shelby GT 500 Mustang Gets Full Treatment from BORLA® Aggressive BORLA® Cat-Back™ and a Long Tube Competition Header Oxnard California – BORLA® Performance Industries owner Alex BORLA® has a star-studded history with Ford legen s like Carroll Shelby who chose BORLA® for his 427 Cobra continuation series just as Ford SVT chose BORLA® for the Cobra-R Mustang. BORLA® RD engineers have designed a complete package for this new GT500 Shelby Mustang super car starting with a tuned Cat-Back™ exhaust (PN140210) incorporating unique genuine BORLA® race-bred brushed satin S-style straight-through mufflers that create more flow weigh considerably less than stock and have that incredible bold BORLA® signature sound. Testing has shown power increases above 20 horsepower alone. BORLA® has taken its racing experience and designed a custom 1-¾” full length competition header with "X-Pipe" (PN17238) for the Shelby that is an engineering performance benchmark: Expensive high quality austenitic stainless steel is the foundation for the quality header this car demands and BORLA® worked with top race teams to design a header that not only is lightweight makes exceptional performance but is also ingeniously designed for chassis fit. Modeled after the successful Ford GT and Mustang GT header PN17238 allows straight forward installation and the ability to work on the car (like clutch and starter) without removing the headers. Serious competitors know what a critical time saving that is at the track. BORLA® has a 30-year tradition of building performance exhaust for high end performance machines and is the original pioneer of high quality austenitic stainless steel (superior to 409 or aluminized steel) free-flow CNC mandrel bent exhaust. Patented award and race winning technology delivers quality sound performance gains and enhanced fuel economy -- all with an easy bolt-on installation and backed by an unsurpassed written million-mile warranty.  ...Read More^@^http://www.borla.com/productImages/misc/17238_vehicle_lg.jpg^@^http://www.borla.com/productImages/misc/17238_th_vehicle_sm.jpg
